attributes.action: Launch an open inquiry into the resignation of Professor David Nutt from the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs and to reassess drug law in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that the government's decision to force the resignation of Professor David Nutt from the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs is an affront to good science, free speech, truth in politics and personal liberty. We believe that in ignoring the discrepancy between drug law in Britain and the harm to society caused by drug use, the government are burying their heads in the sand and refusing to enter a reasoned debate on drug policy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
